## PreflightTest.Report.isTurnRequired property

Whether TURN is required to connect to media.

This is dependent on the selected ICE candidates, and will be `true` if either is of type "relay", `false` if both are of another type, or `null` if there are no selected ICE candidates.

See `PreflightTest.Options.iceServers` for more details.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
[Constants.PreflightReportIsTurnRequired]: boolean | null;
```
